thread.title: Flint water doctor warns of 'more Flints to come' with Trump as president
thread.title_full: Flint water doctor warns of 'more Flints to come' with Trump as president

author: Ron Fonger | rfonger1@mlive.com
title: Flint water doctor warns of 'more Flints to come' with Trump as president
text: The pediatrician who helped make the connection between elevated lead in Flint water and in the blood of city children is warning a national audience of "more Flints to come with the Trump administration."
